headline: EBARA DRY VACUUM PUMP 42.0 CFM
description: Dry Vacuum Pump     Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Ebara
Model 40X20
Dry Pump YES
Pumping Speed 42.0 CFM (1,186.8 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 3.00E-2(En) torr (4.00E-2 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Refurbished YES
Duty--Service Corrosive
Rotational Speed 2,880 RPM
Oil Type Fomblin TM
Other Information Water cooled
Designed for operation in harsh applications such as:
LPCVD, PECVD, CVD and metal etch.
Water cooling manifold w/3/8" NPT connections
N2 purge system w/pressure regulator and flow meter
No motor starters or controls included
Condition Very Good
Power Requirements 220 V 12.2 A 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 16.000 in (40.6 cm)
Depth 32.000 in (81.3 cm)
Height 22.000 in (55.9 cm)
Weight 426 lb (193 kg)
